api_list.api_description: Get geolocation information based on IP address.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address to look up.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve information for a given ZIP code in Brazil.

required_parameters.name: cep
required_parameters.description: ZIP code in the format of 8 digits.

optional_parameters.name: return_format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the return data (json or xml).

query: Can you get my current location details using my IP address and then give me information about the Brazilian ZIP code 01001000?
